processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the Library's Manuscripts Department from the Rare Book Department on April 16, 1986.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of sixty-one architectural drawings, 1930-1931, for the Clarksville residence of Mrs. W. R. Massie of "Rose Hill" in Greenwood, Virginia, by the architectural firm of [William Lawrence] Bottomley, [W. Sydney] Wagner & [Cornelius J.] White of New York City. Also present are seven pages of specifications and a cover letter signed by White.
